decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, 113-PL-02-R3, 113-PL-03-R3 and 113-PL-04-R3, received on 04/06/2013, and 113-PL-07-R4, received on 01/08/2013 and 113-PL-05-R5, 113-PL-06-R5, received on 24/10/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 24 Stucley Road, Hounslow, TW5 0TN

Condition : 6 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a two storey side and rear extension, increase in height of the existing garage at the rear of the house and conversion into habitable space.
